name: Cold Room
description: You enter what feels like a blast chiller. Frost covers the walls and floor. Your breath forms a thick cloud in front of your face and you shiver violently. Embedded in the floor in front of the passage opposite your entrance it is a vent that must be the source of the cold.

on: You try to look, but you can't see a thing.

lantern: You try to look but you can't see a thing.
